author: Special Correspondent
text:
The all party meeting for the Edappadi Assembly constituency held at the Edappadi taluk office on Saturday witnessed heated arguments between representatives of AIADMK and DMK.

Kumareswaran, Returning Officer of the Edappadi constituency, presided over the meeting, in which representatives of AIADMK, DMK, Congress, PMK, CPI, CPI (M) participated.

The Returning Officer sought the views of the representatives of the political parties on shifting the polling stations near Sinnamanali Selvanayagi Temple in Edappadi municipal limits, Vadugapatti polling station in Konganapuram union, and one polling station in Nangavalli union.

He also explained the implementation of election code of conduct in the constituency and sought the cooperation of the political parties.

The representatives of AIADMK demanded the officials to explain the poll code of conduct properly. They complained that the officials have been covering the plaques of various projects along with the portraits of the leaders.

The DMK representatives raised objection to the complaint preferred by the ruling party men.

This led to heated arguments between the representatives of both the parties. Before the situation gets worsened, the officials intervened and pacified both the groups.
title: All party meeting witnesses heated exchanges
